mapper.select: SELECT t.token_id, t.jwt, t.token_type, t.expired, t.revoked FROM token t INNER JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND (t.expired = false OR t.revoked = false)
SELECT token_id, user_id, jwt, token_type, expired, revoked FROM token WHERE jwt = #{jwt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO token (token_id, user_id, jwt, token_type, expired, revoked) VALUES (#{tokenId}, #{userId}, #{jwt}, #{tokenType}, #{expired}, #{revoked})

update.foreach: UPDATE token SET expired = #{token.expired}, revoked = #{token.revoked} WHERE token_id = #{token.tokenId}

mapper.update: UPDATE token SET expired = #{expired}, revoked = #{revoked} WHERE token_id = #{tokenId}
